entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SourceGenerator is too slow #63397
  • "Error CS8034: failed to load Analyzer", if analyzer is packed with native dependencies #63396
  • The compiler broke recently #63395
  • Error list is stuck #63394

Closed

  • Add argument name refactoring on commented first arg seems to duplicate comment #63361
  • `args` not offered in top-level statements #63393

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass SolutionServices in more places #63398
    Area-IDE
  • Share a DiagnosticAnalyzerInfoCache between DiagnosticAnalyzerService and DiagnosticAnalyzerServiceQuickInfoProvider #63392
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Simplify TypeKind condition #63379
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63390
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Use existing Program class declaration in "Convert to 'Program.Main'" refactoring when possible #63276
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Classify 'u8' in Utf8 string literals as keyword #63381
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Fixes EnC slot mapping for certain kinds of synthesized variables lifted to state machine fields #63295
    Area-Compilers
